intro: Ctenitopsis sinii, commonly known as the Chinese spider flower, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its delicate, daisy-like flowers. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, white to pale yellow blooms. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes. Ctenitopsis sinii prefers well-drained soil and full sun to partial shade for optimal growth.
